main event: An unidentified flying object was reported in Las Vegas, NV, observed as a yellow-orange light moving horizontally at high speed on 6 November 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as yellow-orange and about 30 feet in diameter., The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes., There were multiple reports from different witnesses describing spherical and circular objects in the area., One witness claimed to observe a bright white illuminated spherical object hovering at 500 feet., The sightings occurred during clear weather conditions.
sighted object: one yellow-orange light, one spherical object illuminated from within
witness description: a police officer and a taxicab driver
